about_the_game:
He is not the hero we need. He is not the hero we deserve. He's the hero... we have. Unfortunately, that will have to cut it.

Big Butt Bobby is a 2D platform game set in a grotesque fantasy world.

Our hero Bobby was ineptly summoned by the Mage, who hired him to save the land from the evil that consumed it. Bobby has no motives, no emotions, probably no braincells... But he does have two big buttocks with which he pays respect to his defeated enemies ;)



Features:
  • Explore a fabulous and colorful fantasy world to save magical kingdom!
  • Face a variety of opponents and finish them with a magical staff, but beware of numerous traps!
  • Discover new powers and use it to overcome obstacles or to eliminate enemies even more effectively!
  • Complete the levels in shortest time possible to break your own records!
  • Face all the difficulty levels to prove you are worthy the hero title!
  • Use your skills and experience to defeat formidable bosses!
  • Discover all hidden secrets scattered around levels!
  • Repeatedly crouch over defeated enemies to make sure they are fully aware how much of a challenge they presented (and get a better score)!
  • Enjoy satysfying and responsive controls both for keyboard and controller!

content_descriptors.notes: Main character have no pants and simplified depiction of his private parts is visible.
